price: na [nagsasabi]: “Wala ngang papasok ngayong araw sa inyo na isang dukha.”
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
